alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:13AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A line of Potentially Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wyoming, southeastern Erie, western Livingston, eastern Orleans, Genesee and western Monroe Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1111 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers and potentially strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Oakfield to near Colden. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greece, Chili, Batavia, Brockport, Geneseo, East Aurora, Albion, Hilton, Darien Lakes State Park, Letchworth State Park, Hamlin Beach State Park, Gates-North Gates, Boston, Le Roy, Perry, Spencerport, Warsaw, Avon, Bennington and Colden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 6 and 7. Interstate 90 between exits 48 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming
